name: charm
description: Shows the information of the specified Charm

charm_found.title: Found {{numOfCharms}} Matches
charm_found.description: Select the charm that you are looking for

not_found.title: No Charms Found
not_found.description:
I searched far and wide and found nothing matching your description.
Make sure the charm you are looking for exists and spelled correctly.

name_too_short.title: Name provided is too short
name_too_short.description: You need to be more precise than that.
